item.title: [Daily] Skills.sh snapshot (2026-02-21)
item.description: Daily snapshot. Providers: skills.sh All Time skills: 31081 Trending skills: 11972 Hot skills: 2414 Top All Time: find-skills (282223) Top Trending: azure-storage (9440) Top Hot: remotion-render (517)

item.title: [Hot] New entry (#1): remotion-render
item.description: New entry in Hot leaderboard. Rank: #1 Installs: 517 Source: inference-sh-6/skills Description: Render videos from React/Remotion component code via inference.sh. Pass TSX code, get MP4. Supports all Remotion APIs: useCurrentFrame, useVideoConfig, spring, interpolate, AbsoluteFill, Sequence. Configurable resolution, FPS, duration, codec. Use for: programmatic video generation, animated graphics, motion design, data-driven videos, React animations to video. Triggers: remotion, render video from code, tsx to video, react video, programmatic video, remotion render, code to video, animated video, motion graphics code, react animation video
